item.title: Greenland contraception force
item.description:
Source: TW

Denmark issues first apology over forced contraception of Greenlandic women

Prime minister admits ‘systemic discrimination’ after thousands of girls and women fitted with IUDs without consent

Miranda Bryant Nordic correspondent
Wed 27 Aug 2025 18.56 BST

Last modified on Thu 28 Aug 2025 02.30 BST Denmark’s prime minister, Mette Frederiksen, has apologised for the first time for the forced contraception scandal in which thousands of Greenlandic girls and women were fitted with contraceptive coils without their permission or knowledge.
